title: Rise of the Vampire
description: Hawaii born author, C.S. Revlis, takes readers on the first of several exciting journeys in Rise of the Vampire.Before Sarah Rusae passed away, she gave her son a crest which serves as the only clue to the identity of his father. Young Teo Rusae, and his best friend Beau, embark on a journey to find the truth. Their adventure will lead them into an era where the human race is in a battle for survival. Cast into the midst of the war between good and evil, Teo begins to discover who he is, and where he fits into the quickly changing world.
author: C.S. Revlis
